meanings.definition: A tall stool for seating at a bar or high counter.
meanings.sent1: The barstools at the counter were comfortable.
meanings.sent2: She sat on one of the barstools while waiting for her drink.
meanings.sent3: The barstools seemed to gossip about the customers they supported.
meanings.sent4: The barstools stood like loyal guards around the bar.
meanings.sent5: The shiny barstools gleamed under the dim lights of the pub.

meanings.definition: To furnish or decorate with barstools.
meanings.sent1: They decided to barstool the new lounge area for a modern look.
meanings.sent2: He barstools his home bar with sleek, black stools.
meanings.sent3: The decorator playfully barstools the entire room with colorful seats.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity barstools the space with unique seating options.
meanings.sent5: The designer barstools the kitchen island, adding a touch of elegance.
